comment: I was always skeptical on this one. First, was the timing, Depp's mother had died shortly before all of this toxic mess blew up. From everything I've read Depp was very close to his mother and would have been pretty emotionally vulnerable. Second, with someone as high profile and with so much to lose as Depp, had he actually committed these acts, there would have been a very large transfer of money into a Heard account with a signed very tight NDA and several months later an announcement of a quiet divorce. Third I already knew that Heard had been arrested on domestic violence charges for hitting her then girlfriend while they were in SeaTac Airport. I already knew that there was something off about her. Yeah, I am and have remained a big fan of Johnny Depp if for nothing more than his TIME and money that went into the further investigation of the case surrounding The West Memphis Three which lead to their release from prison. Celebs can always give money but he went the distance and gave his time. I didn't want to believe that Johnny Depp was an abuser but still felt that the reasons for my skepticism were valid and time has been the proof that he is not.

comment: AH is a narcissistic sociopath and I hope Johnny wins. Here's what I hope he does. I hope JD doesn't make the ACLU a co-defendant on the case because that would give Amber the power behind them. I hope Johnny takes Amber to court and wins his case (which he has more than proven he should). After that I want him to sue the ACLU. At that point the court would have already established the article was about him and it was defamatory and libel. The emails clearly establish a motive for the ACLU to benefit from this article and I highly doubt ignorance of the facts (f they even were) is a justifiable defense. I suspect if JD sues the ACLU after winning the case against Amber they will be itching to settle out of court. Money has never been his motivation, but I do hope he gets a decent pay out and donates at least a large portion to CHLA since they got ripped off. I expect the ACLU would publicly throw Amber under the bus, claim they knew nothing about her abuse toward Johnny or that she lied about all the abuse she claims he inflicted on her. They would then publicly apologize to Johnny, urge everyone else to do so as well, bring awareness to male DV and help Hollywood have the spine to follow suit. In a perfect world I want the ACLU to be held accountable, but if I had to choose who goes down for this hoax for Johnny to recover his career and reputation I would choose for Amber to be blacklisted from Hollywood and shown as the abusive lair she is, even if ACLU gets to feign ignorance.

comment:
Wow. If the ACLU was looking for good publicity, they were sorely mistaken. Every single person involved in making Heard an ambassador for them, involving her in any of their schemes, and pursuing this coverup, should be fired immediately. The ACLU has just set back victim‚Äôs rights, and societal needs, by decades. Both male and female victims are going to suffer as a result of the ACLU actions. What they have done is absolutely disgusting and shameful.

I always thought the ACLU was supposed to help people. Now I find that they‚Äôre happy to do the opposite, as long as it suits their own agenda. Just awful. They are supposed to represent victims, and instead they represented an abuser - and tried to cover up their complicity, instead of doing what is right!

The only way that they can redeem themselves is by firing everyone involved, providing training so this doesn‚Äôt happen again, providing Depp‚Äôs team with anything they need, publicly apologising for their despicable actions, publicly condemning Heard‚Äôs actions, and helping Johnny and the state take Heard to court so she can finally be held responsible for all her illegal and abusive behaviour over the years.
author: Just Another Happy Humanist
